name: La Estrella
preparation:
This spicy and sweet cocktail will have you seeing stars.

In a mixing glass, muddle the sugar cubes and 1 oz of the club soda until they dissolve.

Add several 1-inch pieces of watermelon and muddle again.

Add the remaining ingredients and fill with ice.

Stir until well chilled.

Strain into a snifter with one large ice cube inside.

Top with the remaining 2 oz club soda and garnish with a pineapple slice and a strawberry.
